title: Troll player
body: Hi i had a player who trolled my game and lost it for our team, and he admits to trolling. His match history is all feeding, after alot of really good games of khazix and draven, so obviously not his account.  stolen account maybe? dik just letting you guys know

replies.body: Did ya report the player in the post game lobby?  That's the best way to let them know.
